description: 2 elderly women in dresses and bald younger man in pinstriped suit sitting at a small table at left; man dancing behind a woman with long hair and fishnet stockings on top of a platform at right with striding woman wearing sandals and a bikini-like garment, bolding balloons, at far right
marks: \"SS TOLD 1C\", in black ink, UR corner verso; \"Stan \"Toby Old 1978\", in pencil, on back
title: Xenon Disco, NYC, from "Standard Deviation, Disco" series
